about_the_game:
Ortheo Voyage is a race-against-time precision platformer, focusing on fluid movement, level exploration, and a dynamic backtrack mechanic. Explore a world where every jump, dive, and maneuver is crucial, and where time is your most relentless adversary. Can you conquer the challenges and retrieve the gears before the clock runs out?

Ortheo, a plucky pirate with a thirst for adventure, embarks on a quest to find his lost relative. Along the way, he crosses paths with Nailbe, his new ghostly friend, and together, they must gather gears to achieve their respective wishes. But beware, each gear collected triggers a world-altering explosion, forcing you to navigate back to the level's start.



  • Embark on an adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced platforming adventure with fluid character movement!
  • Immerse yourself in a world brought to life with stylized 3D models and graphics, creating a visually captivating experience!
  • Form connections with lovable characters, each with their own unique quirks and personalities!
  • Navigate through a collection of exquisitely crafted settings and levels, each of which has a unique mix of difficulties and secrets to discover.
  • Enjoy engaging gameplay that gives you the option to select your preferred playstyle—push through to the finish line for a quick thrill or take your time to discover every nook and crevice!
  • Play platform games in a silky smooth manner with controls that are well calibrated for accuracy and responsiveness!
  • Battle deadly bosses who will put your abilities to the test!
  • Enjoy a pleasant soundtrack that goes well with the dramatic scenarios and mood of the game!
